ngiemboon: À nyɛ̌ mmɔ̌g, ńkaa lekʉŋ ńtÿɔ́gɔ mǒ.
en: He lit the fire and carried the pot to put on top.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ge kaa gú jú, é gʉa túŋ moon!
en: They will also carry you to go to bury, no doubt!

ngiemboon: À fùɔ lɔɔn ńtóŋo ɔ́, ɔ̀ zẅíŋ ngie mòon.
en: If his majesty calls you, accept by saying yes.
What are you doing there little one?
long rod for weaving a mat
guide for guiding a mat being woven
This thing doesn't belong to me.
theirs (3rd person plural possessive pronoun referring back to class 4 and 6 nouns)
theirs (3rd person plural possessive adjective modifying class 4 and 6 nouns)
theirs (3rd person emphatic plural possessive adjective modifying class 4 and 6 nouns)

ngiemboon: À nǔu káb we tà ndyé ne ńkẅɛɛ lê mɔ̀g.
en: He smoked his pipe until the smoke came out intermittently.
